com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model

Interface RuleBook<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Result type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRuleBookRunner, CoRRuleBook, RuleBookAuditor, RuleBookRunner, RuleBookRunner4PojoClasses, SpringAwareRuleBookRunner, SpringRuleBook

    public interface RuleBook<T>
    The RuleBook interface for defining objects that handle the behavior of rules chained together.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRule(Rule rule)
      Add a Rule.
      default void defineRules()
      The defineRules method can be optionally implemented to define rules in a either a completely custom RuleBook or in a RuleBook that extends (subclasses) an existing RuleBook implementation.
      java.util.Optional<Result<T>> getResult()
      Get the Result of the RuleBook.
      boolean hasRules()
      The hasRules() method returns true if any Rules have been defined in the RuleBook.
      void run(NameValueReferableMap facts)
      Run the RuleBook given the facts supplied.
      void setDefaultResult(java.util.function.Supplier<T> supplier)
      Set the default Result supplier function; this should be set for RuleBooks that are expected to produce a Result.
      void setDefaultResult(T result)
      Set the default Result value; this should be set for RuleBooks that are expected to produce a Result.

    • Method Detail

      • addRule

        void addRule(Rule rule)
        Add a Rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - the Rule to add to the RuleBook

      • run

        void run(NameValueReferableMap facts)
        Run the RuleBook given the facts supplied.
        Parameters:
        facts - the facts to be applied to the execution of the RuleBook

      • setDefaultResult

        void setDefaultResult(T result)
        Set the default Result value; this should be set for RuleBooks that are expected to produce a Result.
        Parameters:
        result - the default Result value

      • setDefaultResult

        void setDefaultResult(java.util.function.Supplier<T> supplier)
        Set the default Result supplier function; this should be set for RuleBooks that are expected to produce a Result.
        Parameters:
        supplier - the default Result value.

      • getResult

        java.util.Optional<Result<T>> getResult()
        Get the Result of the RuleBook.
        Returns:
        the Result of the RuleBook

      • defineRules

        default void defineRules()
        The defineRules method can be optionally implemented to define rules in a either a completely custom RuleBook or in a RuleBook that extends (subclasses) an existing RuleBook implementation.

      • hasRules

        boolean hasRules()
        The hasRules() method returns true if any Rules have been defined in the RuleBook.
        Returns:
        true if any Rules have been defined in the RuleBook, otherwise false.
